hackathon-description-text: HackBudapest is a creativity marathon, where students work together in teams to create something exciting, over just a weekend. We provide you with a venue, prizes, awesome events, food and drinks, all you need to do is come and create something cool!
hackathon-eligibility: Teams that are present at the venue. Maximum 4 people on the team.
hackathon-requirements: Please post screenshots or photos of your project. If possible, add Github repo. If you developed a mobile application, try to submit a video of it.
hackathon-rules: Maximum size of the teams: 4 people.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Plane tickets for up to 50.000 HUF

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best IoT Hack Using a Qualcomm Device
